disable_ct_log.title: Disable CT log submission
disable_ct_log.description: If set, Fulcio will not submit issued certificates to a CT log.

ct_log_url.title: URL of the CT log to submit to
ct_log_url.description: If set, Fulcio will submit issued certificates to the specified CT log instead of the default in-cluster CT Log.

cloud_credential_config.title: Google Cloud Web Identity JSON config / Service Account token key json
cloud_credential_config.description: If set, Fulcio will use these credentials to impersonate GCP service account from trusted external cloud providers

secret.title: The name of the secret containing the fulcio keys, password and PEM
